docs.title: Docker Installations
docs.description: In this page are listed all the active/current Docker Installations. To create a new one, add a row with server name, installation path on the server and the folder name where Fluentis should be installed. After inserting the request data, save it with the green floppy icon, placed on the top right corner of the page.

docs.title: Environments
docs.description: In this page there are all the Fluentis and ARM installations. At first the page will show all the ARM servers and databases, then for each arm server all the related fluentis cluster and finally for each cluster all the releated databases.
